translation.en: [man] Gatekeeper, this is Mothership. The Four Horsemen are on the gallop.
translation.it: Guardiano, qui nave madre. I Quattro Cavalieri sono al galoppo.

translation.en: You are a go to open the stable door. I repeat, open the stable door.
translation.it: Apri le porte della stalla. Ripeto, apri le porte della stalla.

translation.en: [woman] The payload is secure, and the Horsemen are en route.
translation.it: Il carico è al sicuro e i Cavalieri sono in viaggio.

translation.en: I think it went. Go, baby.
What are you doing? Get in here. I feel it!
translation.it: Che stai facendo? Torna dentro. Mi viene voglia!

translation.en: [soldier 1] Any idea what the hell we're hauling?
Why we need all this firepower to protect it?
[soldier 2] Could be anything from a briefcase nuke to the original copy of the Constitution
translation.it: Potrebbe essere una bomba nucleare o la copia originale della Costituzione,

translation.en: but the one written in the Founding Fathers' blood.
translation.it: ma quella scritta col sangue dei Padri Fondatori.
Giusto. O forse si tratta di…

translation.en: I was thinking more like headpiece to the Staff of Ra
translation.it: Io pensavo più all'amuleto dell'Asta di Ra

translation.en: or, uh, Amelia Earhart but alive.
translation.it: o ad Amelia Earhart, ma viva.

translation.en: -So, the less you know, the better. -True.
translation.it: - Meno ne sappiamo, meglio è. - Già.

translation.en: I got you a little present for making an honest woman out of me.
translation.it: Ho un regalino per te per aver fatto di me una donna onesta.

translation.en: [chuckles] Okay. What? Wait, what are you talking about?
translation.it: Ok. Cosa? Aspetta. Di che si tratta?

translation.en: You are in trouble now, mister.
How about the lunar lander that was supposedly left on the moon?
translation.it: E se fosse il modulo lunare che pare sia stato lasciato sulla Luna?

translation.en: [soldier 2] Yeah, I like the thematic extraterrestrial reference,
translation.it: Sì, mi piace il riferimento extraterrestre,

translation.en: seeing as we're just coming from, uh… Well, you know.
-So you're saying there's a chance. -Chance of what?
Chance we're hauling a… Well, you know.
but the Holy Grail of things we shouldn't be hauling.
translation.it: ma il Sacro Graal di ciò che non dovremmo trasportare.

translation.en: You're gonna just make me say it out loud?
translation.it: Vuoi che lo dica ad alta voce?

translation.en: I honestly don't… I mean, you're being cryptic.
All right, I'll say it. It's an alien.
-Let's get this thing out! -[soldier 3] Hurry up!
Never mind. They're dead in there. Let's get to this one. Come on.
translation.it: Lasciateli lì. Sono tutti morti. Controllate qui.

translation.en: -[soldier 6] Guys, get to payload two! -[soldier 7] Copy that!
Mothership, this is the Four Horsemen. Do you copy?
We're in an emergency situation, Mothership. Requesting support.
translation.it: Siamo in una situazione di emergenza. Chiediamo rinforzi.

translation.en: [woman] Copy, Horsemen. What is the nature of your emergency?
translation.it: Ricevuto, Cavalieri. Qual è la natura dell'emergenza?

translation.en: We've been in a serious accident, Mothership.
We got numerous fatalities for sure. We need a medevac ASAP.
translation.it: Con diverse vittime. Serve un trasporto medico.

translation.en: [woman] Copy that, Horsemen. Dispatching medevac now.
Keep your comms open while I contact the medevac.
[woman] Horsemen, what is the condition of the payload?
translation.it: Cavalieri, in che condizioni è il carico?

translation.en: Looks like it's busted open in the middle of the highway.
translation.it: Si è aperto in mezzo all'autostrada.

translation.en: Gather whoever can walk or move and get away from the payload immediately.
translation.it: Radunate chiunque riesca a muoversi e allontanatevi dal carico.

translation.en: Wait, what are you telling me to do?
translation.it: Non ho capito. Cosa dobbiamo fare?

translation.en: [woman] Shut the fuck up and listen to me. Get your men out of there, Horsemen.
translation.it: Chiudi il becco e ascolta. Porta via di lì i tuoi uomini.

translation.en: If they can't move, leave them. You understand? Get away from that location now! Do you copy?
translation.it: Se non possono muoversi, lasciali lì. Allontanatevi subito dal carico, capito?

translation.en: -They said to stay away from it. -[soldier 9] What?
You heard what they said. We need to move now!
We need to go back. They need our help!
No. There is no "they." You understand? Everyone's fucked. Come on.
translation.it: Non c'è nessuno da salvare. Sono tutti fottuti. Dai.

translation.en: No, no, no. We can't stop. We got to keep moving.
translation.it: No. Non possiamo fermarci. Dobbiamo andare.

translation.en: We're far enough away now. It's okay.
translation.it: Siamo abbastanza lontani. Va tutto bene.

translation.en: -[growling in the distance] -It's getting further away. Let's go.
-Holy shit. Are you kidding me? -That really scared me. [chuckles]
translation.it: - Porca puttana. Non ci credo. - Che paura.

translation.en: [man] I saw what you did there.
[reporter] Thousands of protesters marched on the Capitol this morning
translation.it: Migliaia di dimostranti hanno marciato sul Campidoglio

translation.en: in response to yesterday's historic Congressional vote
translation.it: dopo lo storico voto di ieri del Congresso

translation.en: that narrowly ratified the controversial proposal
translation.it: che ha ratificato la controversa proposta

translation.en: to wipe out the last remains of the so-called Zombie Wars,
translation.it: di eliminare l'ultima cosiddetta orda di zombi

translation.en: which drew to a dramatic end
with the US military suffering massive casualties
translation.it: molteplici vittime tra i membri dell'esercito

translation.en: as Vegas was walled off with the zombies left inside to haunt the abandoned city.
translation.it: Ora un muro circonda Las Vegas e gli zombi infestano la città.

translation.en: This will mark the culmination of the president's efforts to fulfill his campaign promise
translation.it: Il Presidente ha così deciso, per rispettare la promessa elettorale

translation.en: to exterminate Las Vegas' undead population
translation.it: di sterminare i morti viventi di Las Vegas,

translation.en: by taking the extreme action of dropping a low-yield tactical nuclear bomb
translation.it: di ricorrere a mali estremi sganciando una bomba nucleare a basso potenziale

translation.en: on the city of Las Vegas in four days' time,
translation.it: su Las Vegas tra quattro giorni,

translation.en: coinciding with sunset on the Fourth of July holiday.
translation.it: quando il sole tramonterà sul 4 luglio.

translation.en: The executive order has prompted the full evacuation of the McCarran quarantine camp,
translation.it: È prevista la totale evacuazione del Campo di Quarantena McCarran,

translation.en: which has long been the target of civil rights groups
translation.it: da tempo obiettivo dei gruppi per i diritti civili

translation.en: who have argued that no evidence of infection has been detected in the camp.
translation.it: che sostengono che non ci siano prove di infezione nel campo.

translation.en: May I talk to that gentleman, please?
[man] Hey, Scott, you got a visitor.

translation.it: Ehi. Lei è Bly Tanaka, vero?

translation.en: It's not every man who saves the secretary of defense
translation.it: Non capita a tutti di salvare il Segretario della Difesa

translation.en: from a horde of flesh-eating monsters,
earns the Medal of Freedom, only to end up…
translation.it: ricevere una Medaglia della Libertà per poi finire…

translation.en: Working at a burger joint. Mr. Tanaka, I am well aware of my situation.
translation.it: A lavorare in un fast food. Sig. Tanaka, conosco la mia situazione.

translation.en: There's $200 million in the basement vault beneath the Strip.
translation.it: Ci sono 200 milioni di dollari in un caveau sotto la Strip.

translation.en: Two hundred million the insurance company already reimbursed me for,
translation.it: Soldi già rimborsati dalla compagnia di assicurazioni.
Ed è qui che subentra lei.

translation.en: the government has already moved more than half of its military presence
translation.it: e il governo ha già richiamato più della metà dei militari

translation.en: I want you to put together a team and get it out.
translation.it: Voglio che metta insieme una squadra per recuperarli.

translation.en: 50 million is yours to divvy up amongst whomever you take in with you.
translation.it: avrà 50 milioni di dollari da dividere col resto del team.

translation.en: Don't give me an answer. Think on it for the night.
translation.it: Non risponda subito. Ci pensi fino a domani.

translation.en: [man on TV] You should just be happy
translation.it: Apprezzate il fatto che questa soluzione sanitaria governativa…

translation.en: that this is essentially a government-funded health care solution
translation.it: Apprezzate il fatto che questa soluzione sanitaria governativa… QUARANTENA: VERITÀ O PAURA

translation.en: that will put an end to all of this.
[woman] Come on, Sean. You know they're not infected.
translation.it: Dai, Sean. Sai bene che non sono infetti.

translation.en: If they were, they would be zombies already.
They're political prisoners, just people the government doesn't want on the streets.
translation.it: Sono prigionieri politici che il governo non vuole in giro.

translation.en: You know as well as I do, if you have questionable immigration status,
translation.it: Se possono contestarti il permesso di soggiorno,

translation.en: advocate for gay rights or abortion,
translation.it: se appoggi i diritti dei gay o l'aborto

translation.en: the next thing you know, they have a temperature gun at your head
translation.it: ti ritrovi con un termometro puntato alla testa

translation.en: or dragging you out of your house or your car under the guise of public safety.
translation.it: o trascinato via da casa o dall'auto con la scusa della sicurezza.

translation.en: [Sean] We've tested thousands of nukes in the Nevada desert.
translation.it: Abbiamo testato molte bombe nucleari nel deserto del Nevada.

translation.en: [man over PA] Attention detainees of Las Vegas McCarran quarantine camp.
translation.it: Attenzione, prigionieri del Campo di Quarantena McCarran.

translation.en: This facility is in an active evacuation.
Board the shuttle bus for Barstow.
Have your current temporary health clearance card
to present to officials as you board the shuttle.
translation.it: dovrà essere presentato agli agenti prima di imbarcarvi.

translation.en: Reminder, shuttles will be leaving every 15 minutes.
-You guys excited for the big move? -Yeah!
Kate, let the kids finish packing.
translation.it: Kate, devono finire di fare le valigie.

translation.en: Kate, I need you to promise me something.
In case anything happens to me in the next few days,
translation.it: Se dovesse succedermi qualcosa nei prossimi giorni,

translation.en: just make sure the kids make it out to Barstow. Okay?
translation.it: assicurati che i ragazzi arrivino a Barstow, ok?

translation.en: What do you mean? What could happen?
Geeta, that is not an option.
[whispering] Kate, she helps people get in, crack a slot machine, slip back out.
translation.it: Kate, lei ti aiuta a entrare, scassinare una slot machine e tornare.

translation.en: Before anyone even knows, you're gone.
translation.it: Sei di ritorno in un baleno.

translation.en: That money is our ticket out of here, or we'll be trapped in Barstow forever.
translation.it: Quei soldi ci servono per andarcene o resteremo a Barstow per sempre.

translation.en: Listen, these guards, they don't give a shit.
translation.it: Ascolta, a quelle guardie non frega un cazzo.

translation.en: But for five grand, I can buy my way out, me and my kids.
translation.it: Ma con 5.000 dollari potrò portare via i miei figli.

translation.en: I have to get the kids out by Friday,
and I will do whatever it takes to protect my family.
translation.it: e farò qualsiasi cosa per proteggere la mia famiglia.

translation.en: Geeta, people that go in there, they don't always come back.
translation.it: Geeta, non tutti quelli che escono poi riescono a tornare.

translation.en: -Hey, wait, wait, wait, Geeta, come on. -Just let it go, okay?
translation.it: - Ehi, aspetta. Geeta, dai. - Lascia perdere, ok?

translation.en: What, you don't have anything better to do?
translation.it: Non hai niente di meglio da fare?

translation.en: -The fuck you say to me, volunteer? -She didn't say anything.
translation.it: - Che cazzo hai detto, volontaria? - Niente.

translation.en: Shut the fuck up! Shut the fuck up!
What? Were you saying something to me?
You know, the first sign of infection is belligerence
translation.it: Il primo sintomo dell'infezione è la belligeranza

translation.en: and actions outside of social norms.
Look at me and hold still.
employee shuttles leave in five minutes.
translation.it: Una navetta per gli addetti partirà tra 5 minuti.

translation.en: I could use my rectal thermometer.
You're down a couple of decimal points.
translation.it: Sei sotto di un paio di decimali.

translation.en: You sure you're feeling all right?
-You sure you're not infected? -I… I'm fine.
translation.it: - Sicura di non essere infetta? - Sto bene.

translation.en: I'm fine. I'm… I feel fine.
you're both within the margin of error, but watch it.
translation.it: siete entrambe entro il margine d'errore, ma attente.

translation.en: You better be on that bus, volunteer.
Do you know how easy it would be for him to make you disappear?
translation.it: Sai con che facilità può farti sparire?

translation.en: All he has to say is that you dropped a degree, and nobody would question it, nobody.
translation.it: Deve solo dire che sei sotto di un grado e nessuno lo contesterebbe. Nessuno.

translation.en: I need you to promise me that you're not gonna do anything stupid.
translation.it: Devi promettermi che non farai stupidaggini.

translation.en: Geeta, it's… it's not worth the risk.
translation.it: Geeta, non vale la pena rischiare.
Una navetta per gli addetti partirà tra 5 minuti.

translation.en: [Scott] Mr. Tanaka, I'm in a tough spot.
I don't like you very much.
So I hate giving you the satisfaction of taking the job, but…
translation.it: Ed eviterei di darle la soddisfazione di accettare, ma…

translation.en: [Tanaka] You'd best to gather your team.
You'll need a helicopter pilot and a safecracker.
translation.it: Le serviranno un pilota d'elicottero e uno scassinatore.

translation.en: I'm gonna text you an address.
[woman in Spanish] I hate to ask, but…
I have to take the kids to school, and if I can't get to my job--
translation.it: Devo portare i ragazzi a scuola e se non arrivo al lavoro…

translation.en: Don't worry about it. Careful, I'm all greasy.
translation.it: Non preoccuparti. Attenta. Sono sporca di grasso.

translation.en: -Sharkey, give her the white loaner. -[Sharkey speaks Spanish]
translation.it: Sharkey, dalle l'auto di cortesia bianca.

translation.en: [Scott] So you think it's a bad idea?
It's not a matter of "think." It's a matter of "is,"
translation.it: Non è questione di "pensare", ma di "essere",

translation.en: and it is a bad goddamn idea.
translation.it: ed è senz'altro una cattiva idea.
- Quindi rifiuti? - Non ho detto questo.

translation.en: That much I'm guessing your ass knew before you even walked in.
translation.it: Lo sapevi ancora prima di chiedermelo.

translation.en: Everything we did, all those people we saved,
But what if… what if just once,
we did something just for us?
What's the split? Even however many ways?
translation.it: Come ce li divideremo? In che modo?

translation.en: Figured you, me, and Vanderohe will take 15 million each, assuming he'll do it.
translation.it: Noi due e Vanderohe, se accetterà, potremmo prenderci 15 milioni a testa.

translation.en: Nobody needs to know our cut.
[chuckles] Who else is on your crazy-ass list?
translation.it: Chi altri c'è sulla tua assurda lista?

translation.en: [Vanderohe] So I see you had a visitor.
Talk to me. How'd it go?
[woman] Well, first time she's come to visit me in six months.
translation.it: In sei mesi, è la prima volta che viene.

translation.en: We can't make small talk for more than 35 minutes
translation.it: Non riusciamo a parlarci per più di 35 minuti

translation.en: without it turning into a fight.
I'm sure that she appreciates you, even if you don't realize it.
translation.it: Sono certo che ti vuole bene, anche se non sembra.

translation.en: -Mmm. -I mean it. And if she doesn't… [whispers] …screw her.
translation.it: Dico davvero. E, se non così fosse, che vada al diavolo.

translation.en: You know, when we were in it, like, when we were really in it,
translation.it: Sapete, quando abbiamo combattuto contro di loro,

translation.en: I never thought about the faces of all the countless monsters
translation.it: non pensavo alle facce di quella miriade di mostri,

translation.en: but now just realized, you know, were people.
translation.it: ma ora mi rendo conto che erano persone.

translation.en: I don't know if being back in would be better or worse.
translation.it: Non so se tornare là migliorerebbe le cose.

translation.en: God, I can't figure that out, but I guess there is a chance that it could be…
translation.it: Proprio non lo so, ma forse c'è la possibilità che si riveli

translation.en: They should have nuked Vegas in the early '90s, but…
translation.it: Dovevano bombardare Las Vegas negli anni '90.

translation.en: -What the hell brings you here? -[Scott chuckles]
Sucks ass. What're you guys doing here?
translation.it: Uno schifo. Cosa ci fate qui?

translation.en: -Well-- -We are putting together a crew for a job.
translation.it: - Beh… - Mettiamo su una squadra per un lavoro.

translation.en: you make two million dollars for one day's work.
translation.it: due milioni per un giorno di lavoro.

translation.en: [Peters] That's my share. Just for me?
Two million dollars if it pans out?
translation.it: Due milioni se tutto va bene?

translation.en: You don't want to know the risks or--
translation.it: Non vuoi neanche conoscere i rischi…

translation.en: Why would I want to know the risks? Two million dollars? That's a lot of cash.
translation.it: Perché dovrei? Due milioni? Sono un mucchio di soldi.

translation.en: Listen, I hate my life so deeply,
translation.it: Ascoltate, odio così tanto la mia vita

translation.en: if I had two million dollars,
You sure you don't want to know?
I bet it has something to do with a helicopter.
translation.it: Ci sarà da pilotare un elicottero, vero?
- E dovrò farlo io? Sì. - Sì.

translation.en: -I'm in. -[Scott] Thanks. Nice seeing you, bud.
translation.it: - Ci sto. - Grazie. È stato bello vederti.

translation.en: Come on. This next one's on me.
That's it, baby. That's what I'm fuckin' talking about!
translation.it: È così che si fa, cazzo!
Mikey Guzman. Il nome mi dice qualcosa.

translation.en: This is your boy, Mikey Guzman, taping live from East Las Vegas.
translation.it: GUZMAN DEI MORTI 420 Sono Mikey Guzman e sono a East Las Vegas.

translation.en: I counted at least five, but let me double-check. Hold on.
translation.it: Ne ho contati almeno cinque, ma fatemi ricontrollare.
Bum, bastardo! Un doppio colpo in testa!

translation.en: There are Reddit forums devoted to this guy.
translation.it: Ci sono dei forum su di lui.

translation.en: -Swagger, man. Hell, yeah. -That's how it's done.
translation.it: - Alla grande, cazzo. - Così si fa.

translation.en: @GuzmanOfTheDead420. Make sure to like and subscribe.
Yo, that motherfucker has a Rolex. That's ten grand at least.
translation.it: Quel bastardo ha un Rolex da 10.000 dollari.

translation.en: What would you say about making 500 grand?
I'd say, "Who the hell do I gotta kill?"
You told me you needed a safecracker. Might be your missing piece.
translation.it: Ci serve uno scassinatore. Forse ho il pezzo mancante.

translation.en: [Scott] How would you like to make 250 grand for one day's work?
translation.it: Ti andrebbe di guadagnare 250.000 dollari in un giorno?

translation.en: This is like showing me a picture of Botticelli's Madonna of the Magnificat
translation.it: È come mostrarmi la Madonna del Magnificat del Botticelli

translation.en: and asking me if I want to fuck her.
Okay, the man who designed this wonderful work of art,
translation.it: Ok, l'uomo che ha progettato questa splendida opera d'arte,

translation.en: for the final chapter in his namesake, Richard Wagner's epic opera,
translation.it: come il capitolo finale dell'opera del suo omonimo, Richard Wagner,

translation.en: -Mmm. -[safecracker] Can it be opened and by me?
translation.it: Se può essere aperta e da me?

translation.en: Watch your fingers, Mr. Big Hand.
But of the world's living locksmiths,
translation.it: Ma, tra tutti gli scassinatori al mondo,

translation.en: do I represent your greatest chance of opening it?
translation.it: rappresento la vostra maggiore probabilità di aprirla?

translation.en: I can, with humility, say yes.
It's a doorway to another realm, my friends, and providence has brought you to me.
translation.it: È un accesso verso un altro regno e la provvidenza vi ha portati da me.

translation.en: -By the way, what's your name? -Scott Ward.
translation.it: - A proposito, il suo nome? - Scott Ward.

translation.en: Scott, this is Damon. That's Chambers.
translation.it: Scott, loro sono Damon e Chambers.

translation.en: -They're with me. They'll be on my dime. -Okay.
translation.it: - Sono con me. Li pago con la mia parte. - Ok.

translation.en: -[Damon] How's it going? -Welcome to the team.
[Vanderohe] Scott, you want to tell me what's up with the kid?
translation.it: Scott, cosa ci fa qui quel ragazzino?

translation.en: Look at him. No offense, but he doesn't look like zombie killer material.
translation.it: Senza offesa, ma ti sembra capace di ammazzare degli zombi?

translation.en: Hi, my name is Dieter, and I'm going to open what cannot be opened.
translation.it: Salve, mi chiamo Dieter e aprirò ciò che non può essere aperto.

translation.en: [Scott] No, we need the kid to open the safe.
translation.it: No, ci serve per aprire la cassaforte.

translation.en: We lose him, we got nothing.
Let's go, guys. Bring it in.
[Tanaka] Lovely to have you all gathered here today.
translation.it: È bello avervi qui tutti insieme.

translation.en: It's restricted airspace. But you can fly out.
translation.it: perché è una zona interdetta, ma vi servirà per tornare.

translation.en: There is an abandoned rescue helicopter on top of the north tower, Sodom.
translation.it: C'è un elicottero di soccorso abbandonato in cima alla torre nord, Sodoma.
Se riuscirete a coordinarvi e a comunicare,

translation.en: this should be a simple in-and-out.
[Tanaka] You will enter the city with a 32-hour window.
translation.it: Avrete 32 ore per agire in città.

translation.en: should be no problem for a gang of tough hombres such as yourselves.
translation.it: non sarà un problema per una banda di tosti hombres come voi.

translation.en: Wait, wait, wait, wait, wait, wait!
How precisely do we do the zombie killing?
translation.it: Di preciso, come si uccidono gli zombi?

translation.en: [Scott] Is there anybody else here who hasn't killed a zombie?
translation.it: Qualcun altro, qui, non ha mai ucciso uno zombi?

translation.en: Well, we all know the basics.
translation.it: Conosciamo tutti le regole di base.

translation.en: Zombies, shamblers, the undead, whatever you wanna call them,
translation.it: Zombi, shambler, non morti… Comunque li chiamiate,

translation.en: when it comes to killing them, it's all about the brain.
translation.it: se dovete ucciderli mirate al cervello.

translation.en: One comes at you, shoot it in the brain. It's that simple. Any questions?
translation.it: Se vi attaccano, sparategli alla testa. Tutto qui. Domande?

translation.en: Yes. What if I took a big rock and smashed it into the head?
translation.it: Sì. E se li colpissi in testa con una grossa pietra?

translation.en: Yeah. Yeah, that, uh… that also would still be targeting the brain, so that would work.
translation.it: Sì, gli spappoleresti comunque il cervello e funzionerebbe.
Mi scusi, sig. Tanaka. Continui pure.

translation.en: [Tanaka] From there, you move down the Strip.
translation.it: Da lì dovrete scendere lungo la Strip.

translation.en: You'll reach the casino in less than two hours.
translation.it: Raggiungerete il casinò in meno di due ore.

translation.en: You go in and find the generator.
translation.it: Una volta dentro, troverete il generatore.

translation.en: The safe, beneath the south tower, Gomorrah…
translation.it: La cassaforte si trova sotto la torre sud, Gomorra,

translation.en: is at the end of a hallway.
There, you'll find several nonlethal deterrents.
translation.it: Lì troverete diversi deterrenti non letali.

translation.en: You'll have to find a way to trigger them.

translation.it: Intanto, il nostro coraggioso pilota/meccanico rifornirà

translation.en: Back at the main door, our safecracker gets to work.
translation.it: Raggiunta la cassaforte, lo scassinatore si metterà al lavoro.

translation.en: Like a surgeon or a painter,
translation.it: Come un chirurgo o un pittore,

translation.en: his masterpiece rendered in barely audible clicks.
translation.it: darà vita al suo capolavoro quasi impercettibile all'udito.

translation.en: Finally, she succumbs to the sheer dominance of his gentle touch.
translation.it: La cassaforte non potrà che soccombere al suo delicato tocco.

translation.en: Then, all you have to do is load the money on the helicopter
translation.it: A quel punto non dovrete fare altro che caricare i soldi sull'elicottero

translation.en: and fly off into the sunset.
…a full day before the nuke ever leaves the launchpad.
translation.it: un giorno prima che sgancino la bomba nucleare.
Sarà come bere un bicchiere di sakè.

translation.en: We're not allowed to say that anymore. It's "lemon squeezy" now.
translation.it: Non si può più dire. È poco rispettoso verso i giapponesi.

translation.en: I think it's fine if he's Japanese-y.

translation.it: Facile come bere un bicchier d'acqua.

translation.en: Oh. Okay. Good job. Good job.
Wait, wait, wait, wait, wait. Hold on. This is the real plan? It's zombies?
translation.it: Aspettate un attimo. Il piano è questo? Uccidere degli zombi?

translation.en: Yeah, bro, what's going on? I thought you were cool with it.
translation.it: Certo. Che ti prende? Credevo volessi farlo.

translation.en: You were always talking about how, if you saw a zombie, you'd fuck his shit up.
translation.it: Dicevi sempre che se ne avessi visto uno l'avresti massacrato.

translation.en: [Damon] Fuck this. I'm out. This is crazy. You all are gonna die.
translation.it: Fanculo. Io mi chiamo fuori. Voi siete matti. Morirete tutti.

translation.en: [Scott] All right, team, grab your load-out bags. See you at 6:00 a.m. sharp.
translation.it: Ok. Recuperate l'attrezzatura. Ci si vede alle 6:00 in punto.

translation.en: My name's Martin. I'm Mr. Tanaka's head of security.
translation.it: Sono Martin, capo della sicurezza del sig. Tanaka.

translation.en: Anything you need, you talk to me.
translation.it: Qualunque cosa vi serva, dite a me.

translation.en: I can access any hardware you might want. I'll also be accompanying you on this job
translation.it: Posso procurarvi il materiale che vi serve e verrò in missione con voi

translation.en: because of my extensive knowledge of the casino.
[Scott] You're insane. You know that, right?
translation.it: Lei è pazzo. Lo sa, vero?

translation.en: But if it's a choice between dying on the Strip
translation.it: Se devo scegliere tra morire sulla Strip

translation.en: and spending another day flipping patties at the Lucky Boy,
translation.it: e passare un altro giorno a girare hamburger da Lucky Boy,

translation.en: I'll gamble on a few million.
Have you given any thought to how you'll get in?
translation.it: Ha pensato a come entrerete in città?

translation.en: [woman over PA] Recent arrivals require a full health inspection.
translation.it: Gli ultimi arrivati devono essere esaminati.

translation.en: Barstow Quarantine Center is a zero-tolerance facility.
translation.it: Il Centro di Quarantena Barstow è a tolleranza zero.

translation.en: Without a green health clearance sticker on your key card,
translation.it: Senza l'adesivo che attesta che siete in salute,

translation.en: you will not be permitted in common areas.
translation.it: vi saranno precluse le zone comuni.

translation.en: -What are you doing here? -I need to talk to you.
translation.it: - Cosa ci fai tu qui? - Devo parlarti.

translation.en: Just hear me out. Hear me out.
Look. I know this is gonna sound crazy.
translation.it: Ascolta, so che ti sembrerà assurdo.

translation.en: But do one thing for me.
translation.it: Ma devi fare una cosa per me.

translation.en: Do this one thing, and I can give you $15 million.
translation.it: Se la farai, potrò darti 15 milioni di dollari.

translation.en: If you do this one thing for me, I will.
translation.it: Se farai questa cosa per me, li avrò.

translation.en: I know this is not gonna make up for what I did… -[scoffs] -…or what type of father I was.
translation.it: Non cancellerà i miei errori come persona né come padre.

translation.en: With $15 million, you can help these people.
translation.it: Ma con 15 milioni potrai aiutare questa gente.

translation.en: You can go back to school, do whatever you want.
translation.it: Riprendere gli studi e fare ciò che vuoi.

translation.en: Whatever you do with this money, I know will be the right thing.
translation.it: So che userai bene questi soldi.

translation.en: [Geeta] Hey. Please! Hey. Hey. You're the coyote, right?
translation.it: Ehi, no, ti prego! Sei il coyote, vero?

translation.en: Not bad for your first time.
translation.it: Non male per essere la prima volta.

translation.en: I understand what beautiful little machine. [chuckles]
Hey, don't point a gun at me.

translation.it: Mi prendi in giro? Cosa significa?

translation.en: I swear to God, if this whole mission
is some insane way for you to reconnect with your daughter--
translation.it: è un modo per riallacciare i rapporti con tua figlia…

translation.en: It's not, all right? Trust me.
She's a volunteer at the camp. She's got connections.
translation.it: È una volontaria del campo. Ha delle conoscenze.

translation.en: She's just giving us a ride into the quarantine zone.
translation.it: Ci porterà alla zona di quarantena.

translation.en: You really think I'd take her inside the city?
translation.it: Credi che la porterei in città?
ATTENZIONE - ZONA DI QUARANTENA QUI NON VALE LA LEGGE DEGLI USA

translation.en: Hey, how you doing? I don't think we've officially met. My name's Martin.
translation.it: Come va? Non ci siamo presentati. Io mi chiamo Martin.

translation.en: Don't talk to me. I don't trust these people, especially you.
translation.it: Non parlarmi. Non mi fido di questa gente, specie di te.

translation.en: -Oh. -You stay the hell away from me.
[man over PA] Detainees at the Las Vegas McCarran Quarantine Center,
this facility will be closed by the end of the day. No personnel…
translation.it: La struttura sarà evacuata entro fine giornata.

translation.en: Does coyote girl have a name?
You can just call me that if you want.
All right, I'll leave you guys to it. I'll meet you outside Barstow in 24 hours.
translation.it: Ok, io me ne vado. Vi aspetto fuori Barstow tra 24 ore.

translation.en: Try not to get nuked or murdered by the undead.
translation.it: Non fatevi polverizzare o uccidere dai non morti.

translation.en: [Kate] Hey. Hey, hey, hey, hey, hey. What's wrong?
You don't think I need something bigger?
translation.it: Non dovrei avere qualcosa di più grosso?

translation.en: If I give you something bigger than that, you're already dead.
translation.it: Se ti do qualcosa di più grosso, sei morto.

translation.en: Give me a fucking break. Really?
Dieter, try not to piss Van off.
-What did you do? -What do you mean?
-Yeah. I took her in. Her and two others. -[gasps]
I take a lot of people in. They need that money to get out of here.
translation.it: Faccio entrare tanta gente. Vogliono i soldi per andarsene.

translation.en: -They know the risks. -[Kate] She has two kids!
translation.it: - Conoscono i rischi. - Ha due figli!

translation.en: Listen, if I knew she had kids, I wouldn't have taken her.
translation.it: Se l'avessi saputo, le avrei detto di no.

translation.en: They went ahead. I… I hung back.
translation.it: Loro sono andate e io sono rimasta lì.

translation.en: They never came out. I'm sorry.
translation.it: Non sono più uscite. Mi dispiace.

translation.en: I waited, Kate, as long as I could, but at the end of the day--
translation.it: Ho aspettato più che ho potuto, ma…

translation.en: We're not having this conversation. You're not coming.
There are two kids whose mother is lost in there.
translation.it: La madre di due figli è dispersa là dentro.

translation.en: Two kids that I help look out for.
translation.it: Due bambini di cui mi occupo.

translation.en: Well, tell us what she looks like. We'll look out for her.
-You think I trust you to do that? -Kate!

translation.it: - Tu non vieni! - Non te lo sto chiedendo!

translation.en: I'm telling you what's gonna happen.
Listen to me. As someone who's seen what this looks like,
translation.it: Stammi a sentire. Ho visto com'è la situazione là dentro

translation.en: this is not a path you wanna go down. I'm not gonna let you try.
translation.it: e non ti consiglio di venire. Non ti lascerò provare.

translation.en: We'll look for your friend. I'll see you when we get out.
translation.it: Cercheremo la tua amica e ti rivedrò fuori.
- Va bene? - No, non va bene.

translation.en: You listen. I'm going in either way.
I can go in with you, and you can keep me safe.
translation.it: Se vengo con te, potrai proteggermi.

translation.en: -Kate. -Or-- Or… I'll just sneak in after you,
translation.it: - Kate… - Oppure, mi intrufolerò dopo di voi

translation.en: If we see your friend, great.
translation.it: Se vedremo la tua amica, la aiuteremo,

translation.en: But you are not to run off looking for her. This is life or death.
translation.it: ma non andrai a cercarla. Qui è questione di vita o di morte.

translation.en: And if you screw around, some of these people are gonna die.
translation.it: Se fai qualche casino, alcune di queste persone moriranno.

translation.en: You understand that? And they've got families too.
translation.it: Hai capito? E anche loro hanno delle famiglie.

translation.en: So you are never, ever to leave my sight.
translation.it: Quindi non allontanarti mai da me.

translation.en: Those are my terms. Are we clear?
Guys, this is Kate, newest member of the team.
translation.it: Ragazzi, lei è Kate, il nuovo membro della squadra.

translation.en: [officer] You having a good time? What's he talking about?
translation.it: Vi state divertendo? Di cosa sta parlando?

translation.en: The bomb that's coming to kill you? Is that what you're talking about?
translation.it: Della bomba che vi ucciderà? È di questo che parlate?

translation.en: That's the last bus. Go, Speedy Gonzales! Arriba.
translation.it: Quella è l'ultima navetta. Via, Speedy Gonzales! Arriba.

translation.en: [man over PA] This is a mandatory evacuation zone.
-We're going to need one more guy. -For what?
You don't know what it's like in there. Not anymore.
translation.it: Tu non sai com'è là dentro. Non più.

translation.en: -The team's big enough-- -Trust me. We need another person.
translation.it: - Siamo già tanti. - Fidati. Serve qualcun altro.

translation.en: What the hell's going on here?
I don't fucking get it. Why the fuck would she bring him?
translation.it: Non capisco, cazzo. Perché cazzo vuole portarlo?

translation.en: Honey, easy with the f-bombs, okay?
translation.it: Tesoro, vacci piano con le parolacce, ok?

translation.en: We're about to march into a sea of dead people and commit grand larceny.
translation.it: Ci faremo strada in un mare di zombi per una mega-rapina,

translation.en: -But excuse me for swearing. -That's for you.
translation.it: - ma niente parolacce. - Quella è tua.

translation.en: We're gonna have some fun, yeah?
I'm telling you, you got the right guy for this.
And also, if you happen to get scared in there or nervous,
translation.it: Se per caso tu dovessi avere paura o sentirti nervosa là dentro,

translation.en: I want you to stay close to me.
Don't ever touch my saw again, okay? Don't ever talk to her again…
translation.it: Non toccare più la mia sega, ok? E non rivolgerle più la parola…

translation.en: Hey. It's not too late to go back.
Weren't smart enough to get out of the sun.
translation.it: Troppo scemi per evitare il sole.

translation.en: You should see what happens when it rains. For a few hours, they all come back to life.
translation.it: Dovreste vedere cosa succede quando piove. Per qualche ora, tornano in vita.

translation.en: You sure know your way around here.
How much you know about how these things operate?
[Chambers] Holy shit. What is all this?
[Lilly] Where the police and military finally fell. -Vegas' last stand. -[growling deeply]
translation.it: Qui è dove polizia ed esercito sono caduti. L'ultimo avamposto.

translation.en: -What the hell is that? -Get behind the car! Go!
translation.it: - Che diavolo è quello? - Tutti dietro l'auto!

translation.en: She was one of Siegfried and Roy's. She guards the beginning of their territory.
translation.it: Una delle tigri di Siegfried e Roy. Protegge il confine.
- Ci sono altre strade? - Non direi.

translation.en: Hey, Cummings. Let me see your gun for a second.
translation.it: Ehi, Cummings. Mostrami la tua pistola.

translation.en: I would say I was hoping I wouldn't have to do that, but I'd be lying.
translation.it: Potrei dire che mi dispiace, ma mentirei.

translation.en: -What are you talking about? -What is she doing?
translation.it: - Ma che dici? - Cosa sta facendo?

translation.en: She just shot me. Shoot her!
They'll know we're here. They won't care so long as we play by their rules.
translation.it: Sapranno che siamo qui. Dobbiamo rispettare le loro regole.

translation.en: -Rules? De qué habla esta pendeja? -[Guzman] O sea, está loca.
translation.it: - Ma che dice quest'idiota? - È pazza.

translation.en: If we wanna go further, we have to make a trade.
Yes. An offering to show our subservience.
translation.it: Sì. Un'offerta che mostri la nostra sottomissione.

translation.en: -If they come, we kill them. -[Lilly] You don't understand.
translation.it: - Se arrivano, li uccidiamo. - Non capisci.

translation.en: -They're not what you think they are. -[Cummings] Shoot her in the face!
translation.it: - Non sono come pensate. - Sparatele in faccia!
Taci, cazzo! Non parliamo degli shambler.

translation.en: They just move and eat. But we're talking about the other ones.
translation.it: Si spostano e mangiano. Io parlo degli altri.
- Gli alfa. - Sì, loro sono più intelligenti e veloci.

translation.en: They're organized. Straight out of your fucking nightmares.
translation.it: Sono organizzati. Sembrano usciti dai vostri incubi.

translation.en: You all keep talking about the city like it's their prison.
translation.it: Parlate della città come se fosse la vostra prigione.
Non lo è. È il loro regno.

translation.en: They won't mind us poking around the outside so long as we play by their rules.
translation.it: Se rispettiamo le loro regole, non ci daranno problemi.

translation.en: -[Cummings] Oh my God! -We're moving into the heart of it now.
translation.it: - Oddio! - Siamo in pieno territorio zombi.

translation.en: I have a mother. I love her.
translation.it: Ho una madre. Le voglio bene.

translation.en: Well, everyone has a mom, you cunt,
but not everyone is an abuser lording power over quarantined women.
translation.it: ma non tutti tormentiamo le donne in quarantena.

translation.en: [Cummings sobbing] She's lying! That's not true.
[Lilly] Shut your mouth. I've seen what you've done to those women.
translation.it: Zitto. Ho visto cos'hai fatto a quelle donne.

translation.en: [Cummings] Oh my God! That's not true at all.
-She? What's she? -[Cummings] No, please. We bonded. Please.
translation.it: - "Lei" chi? - No, per favore. Slegatemi, vi prego.

translation.en: No. No, no, no. Don't trust her.
Help me. Don't go. No, we're a team.
translation.it: Aiutatemi. Non andatevene. Siamo una squadra.

translation.en: Help. Shoot this! What the fuck is this thing?

translation.it: Non sono qui per farti male.

translation.en: Come on. Help me, help me, help me, help me.
No! No, no, no, no, no.
Don't do it. Just stay away.
Go away. Go over there. Go over there.
-[Scott] You ever seen her kill anyone? -[Lilly] Couple times.
translation.it: - L'hai mai vista uccidere? - Un paio di volte.

translation.en: [Lilly] My theory, this started with one of them, an original.
translation.it: Secondo me tutto è partito da uno di loro, l'originario.

translation.en: [Lilly] Whoever that is, if he bites you--
-[Vanderohe] Then you become an alpha. -[Lilly] Exactly.
Looks like they're taking him to the Olympus.
Good. Now we know where not to go.
translation.it: Bene. Ora sappiamo dove non andare.

translation.en: [Lilly] I've never figured out exactly how it works.
translation.it: Non ho mai capito bene come funziona.

translation.en: All I know is they take you in there, and you come out like one of them,
translation.it: So solo che ti portano là e che quando torni sei uno di loro.

translation.en: -So, they're taking him there to turn him. -[Lilly] Yes.
Scott, that could be where Geeta is.
translation.it: Scott, forse Geeta si trova là.

translation.en: Kate, we've already talked about this.
-[Kate] We have time. -[Scott] It's not an option.
So, the shithead buys us passage, and we keep going?
translation.it: Quindi lo stronzo ci ha garantito il libero accesso?

translation.en: Well, yeah. The shithead should buy us some goodwill,
translation.it: Sì, lo stronzo ci ha garantito la loro benevolenza,

translation.en: but I'm not about to flaunt it by walking on their streets.
translation.it: ma non la ostenteremo sulla pubblica via.

translation.en: If we want to go further, we go indoors.
Hey, uh, has there been any thought given to triage?
translation.it: Ehi, hai riflettuto sull'ordine di importanza?

translation.en: Well, I mean, obviously, the German is the most important person
translation.it: Voglio dire che ovviamente il tedesco è il più importante tra noi

translation.en: but barring that, it's got to be me, right?
translation.it: ma la seconda per importanza sono io, giusto?

translation.en: Because without me, you can't fly the chopper out of here.
translation.it: Senza di me, non sapreste pilotare l'elicottero.

translation.en: So that would make me second most important.
translation.it: Quindi sono la seconda per importanza.

translation.en: And I don't know if you two are tied for third or whatever,
translation.it: E non so se voi siate a pari merito per il terzo posto,

translation.en: but I'm certainly more important than that guy.
translation.it: ma di certo io sono più importante di quel tizio.

translation.en: Sorry. I didn't know you were listening. I am way…
[chuckles] Okay, I am definitely more important than that guy.
translation.it: Ok, sono sicuramente più importante di quel tizio.

translation.en: You know why he was hired?
He was hired to keep tabs on us for when we open the safe, that we didn't take the money and run.
translation.it: Ci tiene d'occhio per evitare che, aperta la cassaforte, scappiamo coi soldi.

translation.en: I'm not trying to be the bad guy,
but we should be incentivized to let him die.
translation.it: ma questo dovrebbe incentivarci a lasciarlo morire.

translation.en: What? What's everybody looking at me for?
translation.it: Che c'è? Perché mi guardate tutti?

translation.en: It's a free country. People can look at whoever they want.
translation.it: È un Paese libero. La gente può guardare chi vuole.

translation.en: Actually, it's not a free country. We're not in America anymore.
translation.it: In realtà, non lo è. Non siamo più in America.

translation.en: Which technically makes it an even freer country, right?
translation.it: Quindi tecnicamente questo è un Paese ancora più libero.

translation.en: What the fuck is this? [shouting indistinctly]
Hey. Let me talk to you for a second.
-I can help you. Just let me-- -[snarls loudly]
Let's just talk turkey for a second. I--
Don't shine the light in their eyes.
translation.it: Non puntargli la luce negli occhi.

translation.en: I've seen this before. They're hibernating.
translation.it: Mi è già capitato. Sono in letargo.

translation.en: If we can't see them, how are we supposed to move forward?
translation.it: Se non li vediamo, come procediamo?

translation.en: Why? You want to check out my ass?
No. I don't trust you to have our backs if shit goes bad.
translation.it: No, non credo che ci difenderesti se le cose andassero male.

translation.en: I've been watching you, and you're up to something.
translation.it: Ti ho tenuto d'occhio e nascondi qualcosa.

translation.en: When we all get to the casino,
I think we need to have a little conversation about what exactly your role is here.
translation.it: dovremo parlare del tuo ruolo qui.

translation.en: -Where's Chambers? -[Martin] She was right behind me.
-What happened? What did you do? -I didn't do anything.
She started shooting. I wasn't close to her.
translation.it: Ha iniziato a sparare, ma ero lontano.

translation.en: Bullshit! She was back there with you! I know she was!
translation.it: Stronzate! Era là dietro con te, lo so!

translation.en: She's gone! Come on. Leave her! She's dead!
translation.it: È morta! Andiamo. Devi lasciarla qui!

translation.en: We gotta move. Come on, move!
There's no way Geeta's alive, right?
I mean, look at these things.
Don't be so sure. I brought a guy in once.
translation.it: Non è detto. Una volta ho portato un tizio,

translation.en: Lost sight of him. Had to leave him. I thought he was dead.
translation.it: ho dovuto lasciarlo e credevo fosse morto.

translation.en: Then three days later, he came walking back out.
translation.it: Tre giorni dopo, è tornato da solo.

translation.en: [Lilly] Said they took him to the Olympus. Shoved him in a room with two other people.
translation.it: L'avevano portato all'Olympus e messo in una stanza con due persone.

translation.en: The leader, he came for them one by one.
translation.it: Il leader andava a prenderli uno alla volta.

translation.en: If my guy hadn't escaped, he would have been next.
translation.it: Se non fosse scappato, sarebbe toccato a lui.

translation.en: So that's a pretty common theme for you?
Do you think I enjoy having to leave people?
I'm doing what I can to make things right.
Yeah, another set of blueprints to the safe.
translation.it: Sì. Altre planimetrie per raggiungere la cassaforte.

translation.en: Tanaka had other teams here before us.
Do you know anything about this?
Peters, get up to the roof.
Get that chopper running as fast as possible. Cruz, go with her.
translation.it: Fai partire l'elicottero al più presto. Cruz, vai con lei.

translation.en: Look, I'm excited to see my friends again, okay?
translation.it: Sono solo felice di rivedere i miei amici.

translation.en: Me and the coyote will do a perimeter check, board up the doors.
translation.it: Io e il coyote controlleremo il perimetro e sbarreremo le porte.

translation.en: Yeah. Kate and I are gonna find the generators.
translation.it: Ok. Io e Kate cercheremo i generatori.

translation.en: Backup gennie's on the third-floor roof. That's gonna be your safer bet.
translation.it: I generatori d'emergenza dovrebbero essere al 2° piano.

translation.en: Van, get Dieter down to the vault.
Dieter, access card for the outer doors to the safe and the service elevators.
translation.it: Dieter, il badge per accedere alla stanza della cassaforte e agli ascensori.

translation.en: It's by the cashiers windows that way.
This should get you inside. Here.
[chuckles] That one's mine. I got another one.
translation.it: Questo è mio. Ne ho un altro.

translation.en: All right. Everybody knows what they're doing. Let's get it done.
translation.it: Ora sapete cosa fare. Al lavoro.

translation.en: No la vayas a cagar, my friend.
translation.it: No la vayas a cagar, amica.

translation.en: Spend all his money on that fucking miniature?
translation.it: Ha speso tutto per quel cazzo di modellino?

translation.en: Guilt finally get the better of you?
One too many out there to die?
Matter of fact, yes, it has.

translation.it: La madre che sta cercando Kate.

translation.en: did you shoot her in the leg too?
I've never left anyone I didn't have to
translation.it: Se ho abbandonato qualcuno è stato per necessità

translation.en: You have no idea what I've seen in those camps.
translation.it: Tu non sai cos'ho visto in quei campi.

translation.en: What those people have to do to survive. At least within these walls, the rules are clear.
translation.it: Cosa fa lì la gente per sopravvivere. Almeno qui le regole sono chiare.

translation.en: You don't see them fucking each other over.
translation.it: Gli zombi non si fottono tra loro.

translation.en: The second one's just for fun.
[Scott] You understand that I had to do it, right?
translation.it: Tu sai che ho dovuto farlo, vero?

translation.en: You know, all those things they were saying… about me after.
translation.it: Sai cos'hanno detto di me dopo.

translation.en: -I want to make sure you know I loved her. -Yeah.
translation.it: - Voglio che tu sappia che l'amavo. - Certo.

translation.en: If I ever made it seem like that wasn't the case, I'm sorry.
translation.it: Se ho mai dato l'impressione che non fosse così, mi spiace.

translation.en: You did what you had to do.
She was one of them. It…
You think that's why I haven't been talking to you all these years?
translation.it: Credi sia per questo che non ti parlavo da anni?

translation.en: -Seemed like the logical assumption. Yeah. -[scoffs] No.
What you did and what happened to her,
I never blamed you for that, ever.
translation.it: Non ti ho mai incolpato. Mai.

translation.en: Well, I don't… I don't get it.
If it wasn't what happened, what the hell was it?
translation.it: Allora per quale ragione non mi parlavi?

translation.en: It's not the fact that… you killed my mother.
translation.it: Non è per il fatto che hai ucciso mia madre.

translation.en: It's that you never showed up after, okay?
You didn't call. You didn't visit.
It's 'cause every time I looked at you,
And then when I tried to come back around, you just…
translation.it: Quando poi ho provato a rifarmi vivo, tu…

translation.en: You seemed like you didn't want me there, so I assumed I should stay gone.
translation.it: sembravi non volermi più e così ti sono stato lontano.

translation.en: You know, maybe there's a chance we could still…
Maybe you could look into college somewhere.
We shouldn't need money. I could open a restaurant.
translation.it: Avremo i soldi. Aprirei un ristorante.
